display_red_view.Title: Display Red View
display_red_view.Description: shows a red view in the main view controller

display_yellow_view.Title: Display Yellow View
display_yellow_view.Description: shows a yellow view in the main view controller

display_green_view.Title: Display Green View
display_green_view.Description: shows a green view in the main view controller

red_view_alpha_component.Title: Red View Alpha Component
red_view_alpha_component.Description: defines the alpha level of the red view

label_text.Title: Label Text
label_text.Description: the title of the main label

tap_to_change_color_enabled.Title: Tap to change views color
tap_to_change_color_enabled.Description: change the colour of the main view when receiving a tap
